_sText:
Created by Captain Nighthawk


This map was originally made for a contest I took part in, I finished the part and decided to upload it here for you guys, the map is designed off Nova Prospekt from Halflife 2, I wanted to use  this idea as Nova Prospekt is seen as a high security prison that would be an ideal Jail theme.

It was designed for the Ct's to be able to have control over the t's as well as several routes for the t's to rebel.
The map is currently being played on the Edgegamers Jailbreak server and does not lag with 40 players on.
There are 20 Ct Spawns and 40 T Spawns, this version was created for Edgegamers, but different versions can be arranged if you notify me.

**This map requires NOBLOCK as many of the games are in small areas and you could end up with t's stuck together**

Features
* Climb
* Disco
* Maze
* Games Area
* Soccer
* Pool
* Heal
* Vents
* Execution rooms
* Cafeteria


Special Features
* A well designed Lockdown that locks each part of the prison down over a period of 3 minutes.


Minor Bugs
* Cubemap issues

The map is completely optimized and should not lag (tested with 40/40)
